casebody.data:
L. M. REED, Receiver of Bethlehem National Bank of Bethlehem, Pa., v. Abe MINDLIN, Appellant. No. 8686. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Feb. 15, 1945. Decided Feb. 16, 1945. Russell C. Mauch, of Bethlehem, Pa. (Mauch & Goodman, of Bethlehem, Pa., on the brief), for appellant. H. P. McFadden, of Bethlehem, Pa., for appellee.

Before PARKER, MARIS, and GOODRICH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed for the reasons stated in the opinion of Judge Kalodner, 53 F.Supp. 313.
